name: Number One Fan
summary_text: Muriel Bayen, a divorced beautician and mother of two, loves to tell stories. She is a huge fan of this singer Vincent Lacroix, in fact she is a dedicated fan. One day Vincent knocks on her door and asks for her help.

name: Resistance
summary_text: In 1944 a group of women in an isolated Welsh village wake up to discover all of the their husbands have mysteriously vanished.

name: True Heart Susie

name: Girl
summary_text: A young woman returns to her small hometown intent on killing her abusive father only to discover someone murdered him the day before. As the girl searches for answers, she uncovers a family legacy more dangerous than she'd imagined.

name: Attack of the Unknown
summary_text: A SWAT team transporting a vicious crime syndicate boss must fight their way out of a county detention center during a catastrophic alien invasion.

name: My Teacher's Wife
summary_text: A high school student has a romantic affair with his math tutor only to discover she is married to his math teacher.

name: Heroes
summary_text: A Vietnam veteran suffering from post traumatic stress disorder breaks out of a VA hospital and goes on a road trip with a sympathetic traveler to start a worm farm in California with his fellow veterans.

name: Miseria e nobiltà

name: Without Men
summary_text: The women of a remote Latin American town are forced to pick up the pieces and remake their world when all the town's men are forcibly recruited by communist guerrillas.

name: Loggerheads
summary_text: Three overlapping stories of estranged families in three regions of North Carolina.

name: 16 Years of Alcohol
summary_text: 16 years of alcohol is about a skinhead named Frankie; his violent childhood, alcoholism and his love for Ska.

name: The Efficiency Expert

name: Massacre Time
summary_text: A prospector and his drunkard half-brother must fight a rancher and his sadistic son after they seize control of his farm.

name: Taxi for Tobruk
summary_text: During World War II, French Commandos join forces with a German officer in order to survive the African desert.

name: Aanandam

name: Patlak Sokaklar: Gerzomat
summary_text: Two cops try to catch a villain who wants to make all people of Istanbul ill.

name: Tomorrow You're Gone
summary_text: Charlie Rankin, recently released from prison, seeks vengeance for his jail-house mentor William "The Buddha" Pettigrew. Along the way, he meets the ethereal, yet streetwise, Florence Jane. They embark on a unlikely road trip, careening towards an unlikely redemption and uncertain resolution.

name: Donovan's Echo
summary_text: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.

name: Aashiqui
summary_text: Rahul and Anu fall in love with each other, but before they unite, they have their own problems to deal with.

name: The Black Sleep

name: We Won't Grow Old Together

summary_text: The Universal Soldiers are used to smuggle diamonds for a CIA Director, but Luc Deveraux continues to cause him problems.

summary_text: After 20 years of marriage, Maria decides to leave. She moves to the room 212 of the hotel opposite her marital home. From there, Maria can scrutinize her apartment, her husband, her wedding. She wonders if she has made the right decision.

name: Easy
summary_text: Heart-broken after several affairs, a woman finds herself torn between a Poet and a TV Host.

name: Witness Protection
summary_text: A mobster, suspected of cooking the books, is targeted by the mob boss. His family manages to escape. He cuts a deal with FBI for witness protection program. A rough week follows for the family.

name: Fantasy Mission Force
summary_text: A force of loners and fighters is put together to try and rescue Generals that are captured by the Japanese and save the war effort with the promise of gold and/or pardons of past crimes.

name: The Dawnseeker
summary_text: Earth 2245: 5 people are sent to a faraway planet to collect the mineral Stardust, which will be used to revive the dying Sun and save Earth. The spaceship also has a Dawnseeker, a killer of humans, that escapes upon reaching destination.

name: Trading Paint
summary_text: Veteran race car driver Sam Munroe and his son, a fellow driver from a small town overcome family and professional conflicts, balancing competition, ego, resentment and a racing nemesis to come out stronger on the other side.

name: Blunt Force Trauma
summary_text: Follows the journey of John and Colt, gunfighters and sometimes lovers, on parallel but very different journeys through an underground dueling culture.

name: Second Show
summary_text: Lalu's life changes after gangster Vishnubuddhan makes him a part of his gang. However, when Vishnubuddhan murders his friend, Lalu sets out to seek revenge.

name: A Liar's Autobiography: The Untrue Story of Monty Python's Graham Chapman
summary_text: An animated, factually incorrect biography of Graham Arthur Chapman, one of the founding members of the comedy group Monty Python.

name: Road to Nowhere
summary_text: A young filmmaker gets wrapped up in a crime while shooting his new project on location.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A dark twist on the morality tale of forbidden love between beautiful Belle and the feared forest Beast. As villagers are being brutally murdered and the Beast is hunted down as the one ...                See full summary »

name: The War Boys
summary_text: Three young vigilantes huddle on la linea ready to chase illegals back across the border into Mexico... but they soon learn that there are borderlines deep within each one of them that each of them has to cross.

name: Eccentricities of a Blonde-Haired Girl
summary_text: A young man falls helplessly in love with a mysterious blonde woman who turns his life upside down.

name: Yeui-eomneun geotdeul
summary_text: A mute hit-man vows to kill only the rude, and save up enough money for tongue surgery.

name: Broken Bridges
summary_text: A fading country music star (Keith) returns to his hometown, where he reunites with his childhood sweetheart and also meets his 16-year-old daughter for the first time.

name: L'homme que j'aime
summary_text: This is a combination coming out and first love story. The swimmer and diver Lucard is interested in attractive Martin. The film follows the characters' coming out with all its difficulties...                See full summary »

name: Pour la peau d'un flic
summary_text: Victim of manipulation, Cop Choucas is wanted for two murders and searched for by every cop in town.

name: Corri uomo corri
summary_text: Several competing groups and mavericks (including the lead character Cuchillo) are hunting a gold treasure of $3,000,000. The gold was reserved for the Mexican revolution.

name: Two-Faced Woman
summary_text: After a ski instructor catches her husband flirting with an old flame, she decides to pose as her (fictitious) twin sister in an attempt to keep him faithful.

name: Oh, Mr. Porter!
summary_text: With the help of a relative, a hopeless railway employee is made stationmaster of Buggleskelly. Determined to make his mark, he devises a number of schemes to put Buggleskelly on the railway map, but instead falls foul of a gang of gun runners.

name: Toni
summary_text: In the 1920s, the Provence is a magnet for immigrants seeking work in the quarries or in agriculture. Many mingle with locals and settle down permanently - like Toni, an Italian who has ...                See full summary »

name: I Don't Know Whether to Slit My Wrists or Leave Them Long
summary_text: This comedy drama features two couples living in the same building, Lucas & Julia the catholics, Aaron & Nora the jewish and Lola the world traveler spanish. The story takes place at the ...                See full summary »

name: Bienvenue à bord
summary_text: Isabelle (Valerie Lemercier), HR of a large cruise company, made the mistake of choosing her boss as a lover. Before embarking on the maiden voyage of the new flagship of the fleet, though,...                See full summary »

name: Chris D'Elia: No Pain
summary_text: Chris D'Elia takes the stage in Minneapolis to offer his thoughts on everything from self-censorship to problematic dolphins to lame mutant powers.

name: Throw Away Your Books, Rally in the Streets
summary_text: An angst-ridden teen dealing with his dysfunctional family hits the streets. The story is inter-cut with various psychedelic, energetic vignettes.

name: The Unholy
summary_text: A priest battles a demon that kills sinners in the act of sinning.

name: Platoon Leader
summary_text: A young officer, just out of West Point is sent to Vietnam, where the men don't respect him until he gets wounded and returns to be a wiser soldier and a better commander

name: Last Summer
summary_text: During summer vacation on Fire Island, three young people become very close. When an uncool girl tries to infiltrate the trio's newly found relationship, they construct an elaborate plot that has violent results.

name: Christmas at the Palace
summary_text: A king who is struggling to live up to his father's name hires an ice skating choreographer for a special Christmas Eve performance to celebrate the founding of his nation.

name: Daphne
summary_text: 'Daphne' is the vibrant character portrait of a young woman on the threshold of a much-needed change.

name: La religieuse
summary_text: 1760s France. Suzanne is shocked when her bourgeois family sends her to a convent. There she faces oppression and torment, leading her to fight back and expose the dehumanizing effect of cloistered life.

name: Che sau
summary_text: A rookie cop takes on a veteran escape driver in a death defying final showdown on the streets of Hong Kong.

name: The Last Push
summary_text: When a tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude.

name: Graduation
summary_text: Four best friends plot to rob a bank during their high school graduation ceremony in order to help out one of the teen's sick relatives.

name: Stardom
summary_text: A young girl is plucked from small-town obscurity and thrust into the spotlight of the glamorous world of super-models.

name: Miss Marple: At Bertram's Hotel
summary_text: During a stay at one of London's most elegant and venerable hotels Miss Marple uncovers a sinister undercurrent of corruption and murder beneath Bertram's stuffy veneer.

name: The Passage
summary_text: During World War II, a Basque shepherd is approached by the underground, who wants him to lead a scientist and his family across the Pyrenees while being pursued by a sadistic German.

name: Charlie Chan at Treasure Island
summary_text: Charlie's investigation of a phony psychic during the 1939 World Exposition on San Francisco's Treasure Island leads him to expose a suicide as murder.

name: The Shadow Effect
summary_text: A young man's life is turned upside down when his violent dreams begin to blend with reality.

name: Zombie Night
summary_text: Zombies come out at night and two families must survive until morning.

name: Haru
summary_text: A humanoid robot is asked to replace Hal, who was killed in a terrible accident, in order help Hal's girlfriend move on in life, but struggles to understand the real Hal's past and the meaning of being alive.

name: Contratiempo
summary_text: A race against time between a man whose son requires urgent treatment and a stockbroker who suddenly lost his investors' money and ruined his own family.

name: Teen Lust
summary_text: An awkward high school student strives to lose his virginity before his parents and their Satanic cult can sacrifice him to the devil.

name: Delhi Safari
summary_text: A group of animals plan a trip to Delhi in order to ask the parliament why the forest they live in is on the verge of destruction.

name: Gumnaami
summary_text: Gumnaami is a film based on the Mukherjee Commission Hearings which happened from 1999 to 2005 where the three theories about Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose's death were discussed and debated.

name: Man in the Chair
summary_text: Christopher Plummer plays Flash, a curmudgeon with a hankering for classic movies and booze. Cameron is a volatile teen who commits grand theft auto just because the car is an exact replica...                See full summary »

name: Homo Erectus
summary_text: A philosophical caveman yearns for more out of life than sticks, stones and raw meat.

name: Happy Together
summary_text: Serious, wannabe writer Chris starts college/UCLA and shares room with Alex, who turns out to be a cute party girl. He wants to move - at first.

name: Patty Hearst
summary_text: In the 1970s, Patricia Hearst is abducted by American revolutionaries, but eventually joins their cause instead.

name: Anthony Adverse
summary_text: In 18th-century Italy, an orphan's debt to the man who raised him threatens to separate him forever from the woman he loves.

name: In un giorno la fine
summary_text: Claudio is a businessman at the top of his game. On his way to an important meeting, his elevator gets stuck. What starts out as a mere technical difficulty turns out to be a catastrophe of...                See full summary »

name: Bin Roye
summary_text: A young woman is conflicted when she falls in love with a man who courts her friend.

name: Toute première fois
summary_text: Jeremie wakes up alongside a pretty woman. But it's the first time for Jeremie, normally he prefers his future husband Antoine. It's a funny story of a "Comming In"

name: German Angst
summary_text: Three German tales of love, sex and death in Berlin from Germany's most shocking directors.

name: Christmas in Conway
summary_text: To the folks in Conway, South Carolina, Duncan Mayor is a very cranky guy. To "my sweet girl" - his wife, Suzy - he's a doting pussycat. But Suzy is just home from the hospital and cared ...                See full summary »

name: In the Name of My Daughter
summary_text: Agnès Le Roux, a young independent woman, returns to Nice in 1976 to have a new start in her life after a failed marriage. All while falling in love with an older lawyer.

name: Murder on the Home Front
summary_text: Set during the London Blitz of 1940, this is a world where people live life in the moment. It is also a world where criminals can use the blackout and devastation to hide their darkest activities.

name: Five Across the Eyes
summary_text: The teenagers Isabella, Jamie, Melanie, Caroline and Stephanie are lost in a shortcut they took in their way back home. The inexperienced Bell is driving her mother's van and is worried ...                See full summary »

name: Hammerhead
summary_text: A scientist tries to save his son from cancer but his experiments turn him into a shark-man instead. A group of people from a pharmaceutical corporation are sent to the mad doctor's island to investigate his activities.

name: A West Texas Children's Story
summary_text: Set in the 1960s, a magical tale of two 12-year-olds embarking on an adventure to find new, cool parents and escape their neglected, overly adult existence.

name: American Crude
summary_text: The paths of several eccentric and troubled strangers cross one night.

name: Unhinged
summary_text: Three young women who crash their car during a rainstorm are taken in by a bizarre family at their large, rural estate.

name: Cold of Kalandar
summary_text: "Cold of Kalandar" pictures within a unique pastoral atmosphere the realist, passionate and emotional story of Mehmet and his family living far from modern life, in a mountain village.

name: 5th Passenger
summary_text: Five crew members are forced into an escape pod built for four after their starship is destroyed. Just as rescue seems imminent, an alien creature boards their craft and attacks them.

name: A Taste of Romance
summary_text: A grudge between two neighboring restaurateurs soon turns to love.

name: Occupant
summary_text: Danny Hill's grandmother just died giving him the opportunity to live in her rent controlled apartment in Manhattan. But as Danny quickly discovers, he may not be the only occupant.

name: Captain Abu Raed
summary_text: When an old airport janitor finds a captain's hat in the trash, he gets pulled into the lives of children in his poor neighborhood. He weaves imaginary stories of his world adventures to offer hope in the face of their harsh reality.

name: Kôrei
summary_text: A psychic housewife and her husband become burdened with a kidnapped girl who escaped her assailant. Junko will not let her husband call the hospital or the police for purely selfish ...                See full summary »

name: Kevin of the North
summary_text: A man must participate in the Iditarod dog race across Alaska to inherit property from his legendary grandfather, but ends up getting much more than he bargained for.

name: The Shiver of the Vampires
summary_text: A young honeymooning couple stop for the night at an ancient castle. Unbeknownst to them, the castle is home to a horde of vampires, who have their own plans for the couple.

name: Flight of the Conchords: Live in London
summary_text: HBO special featuring the folk duo from New Zealand performing live at the London Apollo.

name: Un petit boulot
summary_text: An unemployed factory worker takes a job as a hit man to make ends meet.

name: Funny Cow
summary_text: A comedian uses her troubled past as material for her stand-up routine, trying to rise up through the comedy circuit by playing Northern England's working men's clubs.

name: Zhit
summary_text: An ordinary hunter accidentally helps a criminal to escape from his accomplices. Two completely different men tries to reach a distant city, but the price of life will be truly terrifying.

name: Polar Storm
summary_text: A comet passes near the Earth and disturbs Earth's magnetic field.

name: Boo, Zino & the Snurks
summary_text: The beautiful world of Gaya is home to a community of creatures, who are much smaller than humans, but who have an uncanny resemblance to them. But the Gayans are facing imminent danger. ...                See full summary »

name: Tempo di viaggio
summary_text: Acclaimed Russian director Andrei Tarkovsky and his screenwriter Tonino Guerra travel all over Italy to scout locations for the film Nostalghia.

name: Orphans
summary_text: Four siblings gathered together for their mother's funeral in Glasgow face individual torments over night during a tumultuous storm that rips the roof off the church.

name: Street Scene
summary_text: Twenty-four hours elapse on the stoop of a Hell's Kitchen tenement as a microcosm of the American melting pot interacts with each other during a summer heatwave.

name: My Own Love Song
summary_text: A wheelchair-bound former singer and her best friend embark on a road trip from Kansas to New Orleans, Louisiana.

name: Dave Chappelle: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize for American Humor
summary_text: An all-star lineup of entertainers salute and celebrate the career achievements of comedian Dave Chappelle, the recipient of the 22nd Annual Mark Twain Prize for American Humor. The event ...                See full summary »

name: Her Minor Thing
summary_text: The life of a successful professional woman turns chaotic when her boyfriend accidentally reveals on TV a highly personal secret about her.

name: Conagher
summary_text: A tough cowboy facing some trouble crosses paths with a lonely woman living in the middle of nowhere.

name: The Image
summary_text: Jean becomes interested in friend Claire's kinky sex with slave Anne.

name: Spasmo
summary_text: Christian (Robert Hoffman) and his girlfriend are taking a walk on a deserted beach when they discover a woman's body lying. A closer look proves that she's alive. The next day Christian ...                See full summary »
